SEARCH
Package Add_card

Class CardInfo

java.lang.Object
Add_card.CardInfo
public class CardInfo extends Object
Represents the information associated with a credit or debit card. This class holds the card number, cardholder name, expiry date, and CVV, and provides validation methods to check the correctness of the card details.

  • Method Details

    • isValidCardNumber

      public boolean isValidCardNumber()
      Validates the card number to ensure it is exactly 16 digits.
      Returns:
      true if the card number is valid, false otherwise

    • isValidCardHolderName

      public boolean isValidCardHolderName()
      Validates the cardholder's name to ensure it is not null or empty.
      Returns:
      true if the cardholder's name is valid, false otherwise

    • isValidCVV

      public boolean isValidCVV()
      Validates the CVV to ensure it is either 3 or 4 digits.
      Returns:
      true if the CVV is valid, false otherwise

    • isValidExpiryDate

      public boolean isValidExpiryDate()
      Validates the expiry date to ensure it is a valid date in the future or the current month. The expiry date should be in either MM/yy or MM/yyyy format.
      Returns:
      true if the expiry date is valid, false otherwise

    • isValidCardInfo

      public boolean isValidCardInfo()
      Validates the entire card information (card number, cardholder name, expiry date, and CVV).
      Returns:
      true if all card details are valid, false otherwise
